column5: I am looking at booking South Shore Lodge on Eagle Lake for Mid September 2011 and been doing some surfing and cannot find any reviews. Looking for someone who's been or knows something about it or even Eagle Lake its self.From what I can tell Eagle a a great lake for us as we love love the Pike - Walleys and bass Any info - advice is appreciated!!   Thanks in advance
Go to hawk lake the worlds best fishing !!!!!!!!!!
Try posting this question here also.......
Great Musky fishing in Eagle. Limits for some species are strict and there is no fishing allowed after sundown. Check out the "Exceptions to Zone 5 Regulations" in the Fishing Regulations Summary.
I see what you are saying about the regs but beyond the regs, what are your thoughts on the lake and lodge if fimailar?
